Why Choose avoiDNS?

Effortless Setup

Simply enter the IP address and URL. We'll handle the rest, making DNS testing a breeze.

Device Agnostic

No need for complex host file setups or proxies. Test across all devices effortlessly.

Planned Launches

Build and test your website behind the scenes. Update DNS when you're ready to go live.

Simplified Security

HTTPS available for all projects. Ensure your test environment is as secure as production.

Easy Sharing

Collaborate seamlessly. Share your test environment with team members and clients instantly.

Incredibly Fast

Adds a very minimal overhead to requests, no performance impact.
